name: Capitan
description:
My GMTK 2019 Jam entry.

CONTROLS:
There's only one - Left Mouse Button to stab with your harpoon.
...
And
Space - Pause
R - Restart level
Hold M - Skip level

But the point stands, there's only one action. Or verb, or what ever... you get it.

Compass Font by Eeve Somepx
Space Cave Tileset by Dmitry Mozgin
Music made in BeepBox
Sound Effect made in bfxr
